title: Geico
meta_description: A visual helper for the 2 requirements needed for a Geico password on their websites and mobile apps.

sections.name: Requirements
shortcuts: Must be between 8 and 16 characters in length
Must contain at least one number

sections.name: Additional Info
shortcuts: Passwords are case sensitive and may only contain the following special characters: ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ -
